content: increasing on the rs row bobble using k2tog bobble as follows *k2tog slip st on the right-hand needle to the left-hand directions for shawl needle repeat from * removing m as you come to them until 1 st remains cut yarn and fasten_off last st garter tab for cast on using gauge needle and with 1 strand of each yarn held finishing together co 3 sts weave in ends on the ws wet block shawl to measurements note place a locking stitch marker through these 3 stitchs so once shawl is dry attach fringe as follows they re easy to identify later cut 154 3 /10cm long pieces of each yarn using 1 strand knit 18 row of each yarn and starting at the center st of the raglan center spine apply fringe to this st then place fringe every other st rotate work 90 degrees then pick up and knit 1 st in each of across the entire shawl the 9 garter ridges trim fringe to a finished length of 1 /2 5cm now pick up and knit 1 st in each of the 3 cast on sts 15 sts are on the needles set up row row 1 ws k3 pm k1 pm p7 pm k1 pm k3 row 2 rs k3 sm m1l k1 m1r sm k7 sm m1l k1 m1r sm k3 4 sts increase d 19 sts row 3 ws k3 sm k3 sm p7 sm k3 sm k3 now work garter increase pattern as follows row 1 rs k3 sm m1l knit to m m1r sm k7 sm m1l knit to m m1r sm k3 4 sts increase d row 2 ws k3 sm knit to m sm p7 sm knit to m sm k3 betwixt shawl version 2 // ©2022 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved p 3 for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission visit follow share visit us follow us share with us #thelambandkid 740 winslow way east @thelambandkid and bainbridge island wa the lamb & kid #tlkbetwixtshawl www thelambandkid com the lamb & kid
